dmca.title: Unauthorized use of Getty Images' Photograph (Case 4143770)
dmca.body:
This is quite a long letter with accompanying photos from a website we used previously but is no longer in use.

Currently we use two of the many pictures they have sent us as infringement of copyright.  These are photos that we believed were in the public domain.

We are a non-profit--actually a maternal and child health organization, using maternal pictures and pics of breastfeeding moms on our website.
